message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'm giving you a good starting point.  Accept, and we're done. Reject, and things get more complicated.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm offering you a sizable sum to end this quickly.  Consider what happens to the money's value if you refuse.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm not giving up more. You're losing more value than me, so the pressure is on you.  Consider this my final offer.
